verses.verse: בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those אֵ֥ין <WH369> there מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> [there was] no king בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> in Israel וּבַיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> and in those days הָהֵ֗ם <WH1992> those שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> the tribe הַדָּנִ֞י <WH1839> of the Danites מְבַקֶּשׁ־ <WH1245> sought ל֤וֹ נַֽחֲלָה֙ <WH5159> them an inheritance לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <WH3427> to dwell in כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not נָ֨פְלָה <WH5307> had not fallen לּ֜וֹ עַד־ <WH5704> until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> for unto that day הַה֛וּא <WH1931> he בְּתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> unto them among שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> [all their] inheritance ס

וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> sent בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children דָ֣ן ׀ <WH1835> of Dan מִֽמִּשְׁפַּחְתָּ֡ם <WH4940> of their family חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> five אֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> men מִקְצוֹתָם֩ <WH7098> from their coasts אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> men בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חַ֜יִל <WH2428> of valour מִצָּרְעָ֣ה <WH6881> from Zorah וּמֵֽאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֗ל <WH847> and from Eshtaol לְרַגֵּ֤ל <WH7270> to spy אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> out the land וּלְחָקְרָ֔הּ <WH2713> and to search וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> it and they said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to לְכ֖וּ <WH1980> Go חִקְר֣וּ <WH2713> search אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> who when they came הַר־ <WH2022> to mount אֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Ephraim עַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> to the house מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> of Micah וַיָּלִ֖ינוּ <WH3885> they lodged שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

הֵ֚מָּה <WH1992> they עִם־ <WH5973> were near בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> When they [were] by the house מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> of Micah וְהֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> they הִכִּ֔ירוּ <WH5234> they knew אֶת־ <WH853> ק֥וֹל <WH6963> the voice הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> of the young man הַלֵּוִ֑י <WH3881> the Levite וַיָּס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> and they turned in שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there וַיֹּ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> thither and said לוֹ֙ מִֽי־ <WH4310> Who הֱבִיאֲךָ֣ <WH935> unto him Who brought הֲלֹ֔ם <WH1988> here וּמָֽה־ <WH4100> and what אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> are you עֹשֶׂ֛ה <WH6213> doing בָּזֶ֖ה <WH2088> this וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what לְּךָ֥ פֹֽה׃ <WH6311> here

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כָּזֹ֣ה <WH2090> unto them Thus וְכָזֶ֔ה <WH2088> and so עָ֥שָׂה <WH6213> dealeth לִ֖י מִיכָ֑ה <WH4318> Micah וַיִּשְׂכְּרֵ֕נִי <WH7936> with me and hath hired וָאֱהִי־ <WH1961> have ל֖וֹ לְכֹהֵֽן׃ <WH3548> me and I am his priest

וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> And they said ל֖וֹ שְׁאַל־ <WH7592> unto him Ask counsel נָ֣א <WH4994> please בֵאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> we pray thee of God וְנֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <WH3045> that we may know הֲתַצְלִ֣יחַ <WH6743> shall be prosperous דַּרְכֵּ֔נוּ <WH1870> whether our way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we הֹלְכִ֥ים <WH1980> which we go עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said לָהֶ֛ם הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> And the priest לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace נֹ֣כַח <WH5227> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD דַּרְכְּכֶ֖ם <WH1870> [is] your way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תֵּֽלְכוּ־ <WH1980> are going בָֽהּ׃ פ

וַיֵּלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> departed חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> Then the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came לָ֑יְשָׁה <WH3919> to Laish וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> and saw אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בְּקִרְבָּ֣הּ <WH7130> that [were] therein יוֹשֶֽׁבֶת־ <WH3427> how they dwelt לָ֠בֶטַח <WH983> careless כְּמִשְׁפַּ֨ט <WH4941> after the manner צִדֹנִ֜ים <WH6722> of the Zidonians שֹׁקֵ֣ט ׀ <WH8252> quiet וּבֹטֵ֗חַ <WH982> and secure וְאֵין־ <WH369> there מַכְלִ֨ים <WH3637> that might put [them] to shame דָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> in [any] thing בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> in the land יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH3423> cast out עֶ֔צֶר <WH6114> magistrate וּרְחֹקִ֥ים <WH7350> and they [were] far הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> from מִצִּ֣דֹנִ֔ים <WH6722> from the Zidonians וְדָבָ֥ר <WH1697> and had no business אֵין־ <WH369> was no לָהֶ֖ם עִם־ <WH5973> with אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> with [any] man

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <WH935> And they came אֶל־ <WH413> about אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> unto their brethren צָרְעָ֖ה <WH6881> to Zorah וְאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֑ל <WH847> and Eshtaol וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said לָהֶ֛ם אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> and their brethren מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> you

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they said ק֚וּמָה <WH6965> Arise וְנַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> that we may go up עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> against כִּ֤י <WH3588> for רָאִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH7200> against them for we have seen אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold טוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> good מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and behold it [is] very וְאַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> and will you מַחְשִׁ֔ים <WH2814> and [are] ye still אַל־ <WH408> nay תֵּעָ֣צְל֔וּ <WH6101> ? be not slothful לָלֶ֥כֶת <WH1980> to go לָבֹ֖א <WH935> [and] to enter לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

כְּבֹאֲכֶ֞ם <WH935> When ye go תָּבֹ֣אוּ ׀ <WH935> ye shall come אֶל־ <WH413> about עַ֣ם <WH5971> unto a people בֹּטֵ֗חַ <WH982> secure וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> land רַחֲבַ֣ת <WH7342> and to a large יָדַ֔יִם <WH3027> it into your hands כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְתָנָ֥הּ <WH5414> hath given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> for God בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> your hand מָקוֹם֙ <WH4725> a place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אֵֽין־ <WH369> there שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> in it מַחְס֔וֹר <WH4270> where [there is] no want כָּל־ <WH3605> of any דָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> of any thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> is on בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> that [is] in the earth

וַיִּסְע֤וּ <WH5265> And there went מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> from מִמִּשְׁפַּ֣חַת <WH4940> from thence of the family הַדָּנִ֔י <WH1839> of the Danites מִצָּרְעָ֖ה <WH6881> out of Zorah וּמֵאֶשְׁתָּאֹ֑ל <WH847> and out of Eshtaol שֵֽׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men חָג֖וּר <WH2296> appointed כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> with weapons מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war

וַֽיַּעֲל֗וּ <WH5927> And they went up וַֽיַּחֲנ֛וּ <WH2583> and pitched בְּקִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִ֖ים <WH7157> in Kirjathjearim בִּֽיהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> in Judah עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֡ן <WH3651> after that קָרְאוּ֩ <WH7121> wherefore they called לַמָּק֨וֹם <WH4725> that place הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he מַחֲנֵה־ דָ֗ן <WH4265> Mahanehdan עַ֚ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> to this הִנֵּ֕ה <WH2009> behold אַחֲרֵ֖י <WH310> behold [it is] behind קִרְיַ֥ת יְעָרִֽים׃ <WH7157> Kirjathjearim

וַיַּעַבְר֥וּ <WH5674> And they passed מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> there הַר־ <WH2022> thence unto mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came עַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> unto the house מִיכָֽה׃ <WH4318> of Micah

וַֽיַּעֲנ֞וּ <WH6030> Then answered חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> men הַהֹלְכִים֮ <WH1980> that went לְרַגֵּל֮ <WH7270> to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> the country לַיִשׁ֒ <WH3919> of Laish וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH251> unto their brethren הַיְדַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH3045> Do ye know כִּ֠י <WH3588> that יֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> that there is בַּבָּתִּ֤ים <WH1004> in these houses הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these אֵפ֣וֹד <WH646> an ephod וּתְרָפִ֔ים <WH8655> and teraphim וּפֶ֖סֶל <WH6459> and a graven image וּמַסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> molten וְעַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> therefore דְּע֥וּ <WH3045> consider מַֽה־ <WH4100> what תַּעֲשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> what ye have to do

וַיָּס֣וּרוּ <WH5493> And they turned שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> thitherward and came אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> to the house הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> of the young man הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> the Levite בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [even] unto the house מִיכָ֑ה <WH4318> of Micah וַיִּשְׁאֲלוּ־ <WH7592> and asked ל֖וֹ לְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> of his welfare

וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> And the six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> men חֲגוּרִים֙ <WH2296> appointed כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> with their weapons מִלְחַמְתָּ֔ם <WH4421> of war נִצָּבִ֖ים <WH5324> stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> by the entering הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> of the gate אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who מִבְּנֵי־ <WH1121> which [were] of the children דָֽן׃ <WH1835> of Dan

וַֽיַּעֲל֞וּ <WH5927> went up חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> And the five הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> men הַהֹלְכִים֮ <WH1980> that went לְרַגֵּ֣ל <WH7270> to spy out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> the land בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> [and] came in שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> there לָקְח֗וּ <WH3947> thither [and] took אֶת־ <WH853> הַפֶּ֙סֶל֙ <WH6456> carved image וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֵפ֔וֹד <WH646> and the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <WH8655> and the teraphim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> and the molten image וְהַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> and the priest נִצָּב֙ <WH5324> stood פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> in the entering הַשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> of the gate וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> with the six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men הֶחָג֖וּר <WH2296> [that were] appointed כְּלֵ֥י <WH3627> with weapons הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these בָּ֚אוּ <WH935> And these went בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> into Micah's וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> and fetched אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֣סֶל <WH6459> the carved image הָאֵפ֔וֹד <WH646> the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <WH8655> and the teraphim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּסֵּכָ֑ה <WH4541> and the molten image וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> the priest מָ֥ה <WH4100> What אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> What עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> unto them What do

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <WH559> And they said ל֨וֹ הַחֲרֵ֜שׁ <WH2790> unto him Hold thy peace שִֽׂים־ <WH7760> lay יָדְךָ֤ <WH3027> thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> over פִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH6310> upon thy mouth וְלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> and come עִמָּ֔נוּ <WH5973> and be to וֶֽהְיֵה־ <WH1961> with us and be to us לָ֖נוּ לְאָ֣ב <WH1> a father וּלְכֹהֵ֑ן <WH3548> and a priest הֲט֣וֹב ׀ <WH2896> [is it] better הֱיוֹתְךָ֣ <WH1961> to be a כֹהֵ֗ן <WH3548> for thee to be a priest לְבֵית֙ <WH1004> unto the house אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> of one א֚וֹ <WH176> or הֱיוֹתְךָ֣ <WH1961> become כֹהֵ֔ן <WH3548> or that thou be a priest לְשֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> unto a tribe וּלְמִשְׁפָּחָ֖ה <WH4940> and a family בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַיִּיטַב֙ <WH3190> was glad לֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> And the priest's וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> and he took אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֵפ֔וֹד <WH646> the ephod וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <WH8655> and the teraphim וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> and the graven image וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and went in בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> the midst הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

וַיִּפְנ֖וּ <WH6437> So they turned וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> and departed וַיָּשִׂ֨ימוּ <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> הַטַּ֧ף <WH2945> the little ones וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּקְנֶ֛ה <WH4735> and the cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּבוּדָּ֖ה <WH3520> and the carriage לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they הִרְחִ֖יקוּ <WH7368> [And] when they were a good way מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house מִיכָ֑ה <WH4318> of Micah וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH582> the men אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who בַּבָּתִּים֙ <WH1004> that [were] in the houses אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who עִם־ <WH5973> near בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house מִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> near to Micah's נִֽזְעֲק֔וּ <WH2199> were gathered together וַיַּדְבִּ֖יקוּ <WH1692> and overtook אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children דָֽן׃ <WH1835> of Dan

וַֽיִּקְרְאוּ֙ <WH7121> And they cried אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> unto the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan וַיַּסֵּ֖בּוּ <WH5437> And they turned פְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> their faces וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> and said לְמִיכָ֔ה <WH4318> unto Micah מַה־ <WH4100> What לְּךָ֖ כִּ֥י <WH3588> that נִזְעָֽקְתָּ׃ <WH2199> What aileth thee that thou comest with such a company

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהַי֩ <WH430> my gods אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָשִׂ֨יתִי <WH6213> which I made לְקַחְתֶּ֧ם <WH3947> Ye have taken away וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> and the priest וַתֵּלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> gone וּמַה־ <WH4100> and what לִּ֣י ע֑וֹד <WH5750> to me וּמַה־ <WH4100> What זֶּ֛ה <WH2088> you תֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> and what have I more? and what [is] this [that] ye say אֵלַ֖י <WH413> to me מַה־ <WH4100> What לָּֽךְ׃

וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children דָ֔ן <WH1835> of Dan אַל־ <WH408> nay תַּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> be heard קוֹלְךָ֖ <WH6963> unto him Let not thy voice עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> among פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> or יִפְגְּע֣וּ <WH6293> run בָכֶ֗ם אֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH376> men מָ֣רֵי <WH4751> angry נֶ֔פֶשׁ <WH5315> thy life וְאָסַפְתָּ֥ה <WH622> upon thee and thou lose נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> with the lives וְנֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> your life בֵּיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> of thy household

וַיֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> went בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan לְדַרְכָּ֑ם <WH1870> their way וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw מִיכָ֗ה <WH4318> and when Micah כִּי־ <WH3588> for חֲזָקִ֥ים <WH2389> that they [were] too strong הֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> they מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <WH4480> were too וַיִּ֖פֶן <WH6437> for him he turned וַיָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> and went back אֶל־ <WH413> to his בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> unto his house

וְהֵ֨מָּה <WH1992> they לָקְח֜וּ <WH3947> And they took אֵ֧ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> had made מִיכָ֗ה <WH4318> [the things] which Micah וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵן֮ <WH3548> and the priest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who הָיָה־ <WH1961> had לוֹ֒ וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> which he had and came עַל־ <WH5921> unto לַ֗יִשׁ <WH3919> unto Laish עַל־ <WH5921> unto עַם֙ <WH5971> unto a people שֹׁקֵ֣ט <WH8252> [that were] at quiet וּבֹטֵ֔חַ <WH982> and secure וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> and they smote אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְפִי־ <WH6310> them with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city שָׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> and burnt בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> and there מַצִּ֜יל <WH5337> And [there was] no deliverer כִּ֧י <WH3588> because רְֽחוֹקָה־ <WH7350> because it [was] far הִ֣יא <WH1931> he מִצִּיד֗וֹן <WH6721> from Zidon וְדָבָ֤ר <WH1697> and they had no business אֵין־ <WH369> was no לָהֶם֙ עִם־ <WH5973> with אָדָ֔ם <WH120> with [any] man וְהִ֕יא <WH1931> he בָּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> and it was in the valley אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְבֵית־ רְח֑וֹב <WH1050> that [lieth] by Bethrehob וַיִּבְנ֥וּ <WH1129> And they built אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> a city וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and dwelt בָֽהּ׃

וַיִּקְרְא֤וּ <WH7121> And they called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city דָּ֔ן <WH1835> Dan בְּשֵׁם֙ <WH8034> after the name דָּ֣ן <WH1835> of Dan אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> their father אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יוּלַּ֖ד <WH3205> who was born לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> unto Israel וְאוּלָ֛ם <WH199> howbeit לַ֥יִשׁ <WH3919> [was] Laish שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city לָרִאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> at the first

וַיָּקִ֧ימוּ <WH6965> set up לָהֶ֛ם בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> And the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑סֶל <WH6459> the graven image וִ֠יהוֹנָתָן <WH3129> Jonathan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son גֵּרְשֹׁ֨ם <WH1647> of Gershom בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מְ נַשֶּׁ֜ה <WH4519> of Manasseh ה֣וּא <WH1931> he וּבָנָ֗יו <WH1121> he and his sons הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become כֹהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> were priests לְשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> to the tribe הַדָּנִ֔י <WH1839> of Dan עַד־ <WH5704> until י֖וֹם <WH3117> until the day גְּל֥וֹת <WH1540> of the captivity הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> And they set them up לָהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֥סֶל <WH6459> graven image מִיכָ֖ה <WH4318> Micah's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he made כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֛י <WH3117> all the time הֱי֥וֹת <WH1961> become בֵּית־ <WH1004> that the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God בְּשִׁלֹֽה׃ <WH7887> was in Shiloh פ
